name: Moonlight: Mistress of Mischief (Canceled)
blurb: Moonlight was created for the 2012 Stealth Jam in a minimal form. Now it's time to take this stealth puzzler and make it perfect!

rewards.reward: At $5, you get the game in its current form almost immediately and all future updates! A code for the game on Desura will be sent to you as soon as its available, which should be between September and October. You will also receive all codes for the game on PC, as well as for Mac and Linux when those versions become available.
Everything above PLUS: Personal thanks in the credits.

Everything Above PLUS:
Design a level for Moonlight! If the project reaches a funding level where I can make a level editor, you'll be able to test the editor. Otherwise I am happy to send you a grid, castle and gameplay guides, tiles, or even an empty template file if you have a copy of Multimedia Fusion 2. Heck you can even sketch your level out on a piece of paper and I'll build the level out from that.

You will also receive proper credit in the game as a Level Designer, as well as a thumbnail of your level next to your name in the credits.

Everything above PLUS: All digital versions of the game ever. If it comes out on mobile, it's yours. If it comes out on console, it's yours. If the game gets a big new version with graphical overhauls, its yours. All updates, expansions, DLC, etc.? Yours. This is basically a lifetime subscription to all that is Moonlight: Mistress of Mischief.

Everything above PLUS: Design an item for Moonlight! Moonlight's inventory needs to be expanded. Right now she only has her trusty knife. Can you think of a great item she could use in her adventures? At this reward, you'll be able to design an item, its mechanics, its limitations, and even its look and name. It can be whatever you want, from everyday tools to fantastic spells. Just please try to stick within the gestalt of the game (fantasy/medieval). I will let you know immediately if the item you have designed is not within the realm of my capability. You will receive credit as an Item Designer on top of Level Designer, and your item's icon will appear next to your name in the credits.

Everything above PLUS: VIP booth access at any con we're ever at. Seriously. I will design you a special "Lantana Games VIP Access" card that you can wave at us at any con to cut to the front of the line at our booths (and if the Enforcers/security/etc. let us let you cut). You can schmooze with us all you want and even join us for drinks! We will also send any extra game codes we get your way so you'll always have something new to play. If any other bonuses come up we will let you know what they are.

Everything above PLUS: Wow. Seriously? $500 for a puzzle game? For this, first of all, you will be part of a "Shrine of Donors" included in the game, complete with a small sprite statue drawn in your likeness. Furthermore, I will send you a special edition CD version of the game, burned by me personally on my home desktop, and load it up with lots of stuff just for you. What kind of stuff? Howabout the soundtrack for the game burned onto that very same CD? You can take the game with you and listen to the music on road trips! Still not good enough? Howabout an included art book with concept art and screenshots from development? Of course, this CD will be signed and include all versions of the game for computers, as well as codes included in the booklet for other versions that may exist by that time. PLEASE NOTE: Special Edition and Gem Editions will not be available until the launch of the final game.

Everything above PLUS: First of all, you will be credited as a Producer. Secondly, you will receive the Gem version of the game. You thought a simple Special Edition CD was cool? How's this for a kicker: This version of the game will have alternate versions of the transition screens than everyone else's. Instead of just Moonlight's sprite running in one direction, your version's transitions will be FMV's, downgraded to be reminiscent of Sega CD-era FMV games like Night Trap! This version will also include everything in the special edition but you will receive it on a purple CD to differentiate it from the regular special edition. PLEASE NOTE: Special Edition and Gem Editions will not be available until the launch of the final game.

Everything above PLUS: Design a castle! You thought designing just a single level was cool? Howabout designing the look, feel, and overarching mechanics of an entire Castle? For instance, The Frozen Fortress has cracks in the ground that will kill you if you step on them twice. I will work with you one on one to design a castle with mechanics that fit into Moonlight's gameplay, create a good level of challenge, and feature a unique look. You will also be credited as a World Designer.

Everything above PLUS: First of all, you will be credited as an Executive Producer. Secondly, this is the "Huge Pack." You will receive 1 Gem Edition + 1 Special Edition + 5 Digital Editions of Moonlight: Mistress of Mischief to gift among your friends. On top of that, not only will you be included in the "Shrine of Donors," but you will also have your own, secret shrine somewhere in the game (you can choose which castle to have it in, or even design a castle dedicated completely to your shrine) complete with a much larger statue made in your likeness. Finally, you will receive a high quality print of the game's final title screen, signed by myself and the Lantana Games team as a personal thank-you. You will also be invited to party with us any time we throw a shindig! PLEASE NOTE: Special Edition and Gem Editions will not be available until the launch of the final game.
